1st_meal: 2 large eggs shakshouka style (150g), 1 medium tamis bread (60g), 1 cup laban (240ml) - cook eggs in tomato sauce with onion and mild spices, serve with tamis and laban.

3rd_meal: 200g chicken kabsa with 150g basmati rice and 100g mixed vegetables - slow cook chicken with spices and basmati, steam vegetables, combine for meal.
4th_meal: 180g jareesh cooked with 50g lean beef, 1 cup laban (240ml), 50g sautéed spinach - simmer jareesh, cook beef, add spinach and laban for creaminess.
Note: Muscle gain plan for beginner male, moderate training 4 days/week, normal BMI, using simple, affordable Saudi foods.

1st_meal: Ful medames (1 cup cooked fava beans) with 2 boiled eggs, 1 small whole wheat tamees (100g), 1 tbsp olive oil drizzle, 1 cup laban (fermented milk). Prepare ful by simmering fava beans with cumin and garlic; eggs boiled hard; tamees warmed.
2nd_meal: 250g plain low-fat labneh with 3 medium dates (30g) and 10 raw almonds. Mix dates chopped into labneh, almonds on side.
3rd_meal: Chicken kabsa: 150g cooked chicken breast, 130g cooked basmati rice with kabsa spices and 1 tbsp vegetable oil, side of 100g mixed salad (cucumber, tomato, onion) with lemon. Prepare kabsa by cooking chicken and rice with traditional spices (cardamom, cinnamon, bay leaf).
4th_meal: Jareesh (cracked wheat) with 100g lean lamb, cooked with onions and mild spices (turmeric, cumin), served with 1 small khubz (60g). Cook jareesh simmered until soft, lamb bites pan-cooked, khubz warmed.

1st_meal: Breakfast: 2 eggs shakshouka (150 g tomatoes, 2 eggs), 1 large tamees bread (80 g), 1 cup laban (250 ml), 3 dates (20 g). Prepare shakshouka by simmering tomatoes with spices and poaching eggs, serve with tamees and laban.
2nd_meal: Snack: 150 g ful medames (stewed fava beans with lemon, olive oil, cumin), 50 g labneh with mint, 10 almonds (12 g). Serve ful warm, drizzle with olive oil, and side of labneh with herbs.
3rd_meal: Lunch: 180 g chicken kabsa (rice cooked with spices and chicken), 100 g mixed salad with olive oil and lemon dressing, 1 medium orange (130 g). Kabsa prepared simmering basmati rice with saffron, spices, and roasted chicken pieces.
4th_meal: Dinner: 200 g harees (cracked wheat with meat), 1 small khubz bread (50 g), 100 g steamed vegetables (carrots, zucchini), 1 cup herbal tea. Harees slow cooked for tenderness, served with bread and vegetables.
